price: Thus did we assign for every prophet an enemy from among the wicked, but your Lord is sufficient as a Guide and Helper.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلۡنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِيٍّ عَدُوّٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هَادِيٗا وَنَصِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
